about_the_game:
Project Nasu is a 2D action and puzzle platformer where you play as a lab experiment trying to escape an evil scientist’s laboratory. Play as Nasu, using his snout to fire projectiles that propel you backward to evade, and fend off threats. Solve puzzles by activating platforms and deactivating lasers to ultimately escape the facility and save Nasu.



  • Master the movement - Learn to propel yourself in all directions while simultaneously avoiding dangers.
  • 15 unique levels - Play through 15 fun and challenging levels to test your skills.
    [*[b]]Completionism
[/b]- Can you collect all the coins? Maybe you'll even be rewarded.
  • Speedrunning - Swiftly make your way through levels with a built-in timer and system that keeps track of your best times.
    • [/list]



    This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

name: Project Nasu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: A 2D action and puzzle platformer where you play as a lab experiment trying to escape an evil scientist's laboratory. Fire projectiles that propel you backward to evade and fend off threats. Solve puzzles to escape the facility and save Nasu.
